name: Rocket Fight
description:
I've done this minigame for the Weekly Hour Game Jam W12 2017.

Ok, it's clearly not a job done in one hour as the rule says. But I was inspired so I let it go all the way...

The theme was "Research is what I'm doing when I don't know what I'm doing" . It's a quote from Wernher von Braun. He was a german engineer who made the V2 rocket during the World War 2 and the Saturn V rocket later. He kind of let his print foot on the Earth I think...

So I decided to make a game about 2 sides who are launching to each other V2 rockets. The player has to choose the power of the rocket by clicking on one of the 4 buttons on the upper left corner.

If you win, you have a prize. If you loose, ... you loose, that's all... ;-)

Credits :
Saturn V picture : Rawdanitsu : http://opengameart.org/users/rawdanitsu

PS : After this Game Jam, I'll continue on this developpement.
